thread.title: Drivers are furious! Kate reports from the controversial bus lane as it rakes in millions
thread.title_full: Drivers are furious! Kate reports from the controversial bus lane as it rakes in millions | Meridian - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Drivers are furious! Kate reports from the controversial bus lane as it rakes in millions
text:
Play video Seventy five motorists a day are being caught by a controversial bus lane camera in Oxford. The camera is raking in more than Â£1.5 million a year for the council. Now local businessmen are calling for better signs to stop confused drivers constantly being stung. The council is refusing to budge, claiming the scheme stops the city centre getting snarled up. Kate Bunkall talked to David Marcus, Oxford High Street Traders; Graham Jones, Rox; and Ian Hudspeth, Leader, Oxfordshire County Council.
Last updated Thu 30 Jul 2015 Travel driving oxford
